message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM

The paper deals with the problem of video comprehension, which involves understanding the semantic content of videos. This is a problem that is relevant to several sub-fields of computer science, including computer vision (cs.CV), natural language processing (cs.CL), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), machine learning (cs.LG), and multimedia (cs.MM). Given that the paper discusses the use of language to formulate video understanding as the task of captioning or description, cs.CL is a likely sub-category. However, since the paper also proposes a new benchmark for video comprehension and tests a collection of approaches on this benchmark, cs.CV is also a likely sub-category.
